column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I heard there was bad service here
column2: but our waitress was great. She knew I was a damn tourist but she was nice to me anyway. She asked me where I was from and I proudly told her I was from Fresno
column3: and she look so confused! Said to me
column4: "I didn't know people in Fresno talked like people from Texas!"
